hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.tf$'; then tofu fmt "$file_path"; fi; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.py$'; then uvx ruff format "$file_path"; fi; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.py$'; then uvx ruff check --fix "$file_path"; fi; }
